p:
Rosin-acid-modified ethyl cellulose/butyl acrylate graft copolymer can be prepared in ATRP reaction from dehydroabietic acid, cellulose, 2-bromoisobutyryl bromide and butyl acrylate according to Scheme 57, prior to sorption of CuBr
x and precipitation in methanol. [ 142]. Potential applications include thermoplastic elastomers and coatings with UV absorption property [ 142].
